1: -module(carboncopy_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -compile([export_all]).
    4: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    5: -include_lib("proper/include/proper.hrl").
    6: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
    7: 
    8: -define(ae(Expected, Actual), ?assertEqual(Expected, Actual)).
    9: 
   10: all() ->
   11:     [{group, properties},{group, essential}].
   12: 
   13: 
   14: groups() ->
   15:     [{essential, [discovering_support,
   16:                   enabling_carbons,
   17:                   disabling_carbons,
   18:                   avoiding_carbons,
   19:                   non_enabled_clients_dont_get_sent_carbons,
   20:                   non_enabled_clients_dont_get_received_carbons,
   21:                   enabled_single_resource_doesnt_get_carbons,
   22:                   dropped_client_doesnt_create_duplicate_carbons
   23:                  ]},
   24:      {properties, [run_properties]}].
   25: 
   26: prop_names() ->
   27:     [p_forward_received_chat_messages,
   28:      p_forward_sent_chat_messages,
   29:      p_normal_routing_to_bare_jid].
   30: 
   31: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   32:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
   33: 
   34: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   35:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   36: 
   37: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
   38:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   39: 
   40: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
   41:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   42: 
   43: init_per_testcase(CaseName,Config) ->
   44:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName,Config).
   45: 
   46: end_per_testcase(CaseName,Config) ->
   47:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName,Config).
   48: 
   49: 
   50: %%
   51: %%  Properties {group, properties}
   52: %%
   53: 
   54: run_properties(Config) ->
   55:     Props = proper:conjunction([mk_prop(P, Config) || P <- prop_names()]),
   56:     ?ae(true, proper:quickcheck(Props, [verbose,long_result, {numtests, 1}])).
   57: 
   58: mk_prop(PropName, Config) ->
   59:     %% Instantiate a property with a CT config object,
   60:     %% Return a tuple for proper:conjunction to use
   61:     {PropName, apply(?MODULE, PropName, [Config])}.
   62: 
   63: 
   64: %%
   65: %%  CT tests {group, essential}
   66: %%
   67: 
   68: discovering_support(Config) ->
   69:     escalus:story(
   70:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
   71:       fun(Alice) ->
   72:               IqGet = escalus_stanza:disco_info(<<"localhost">>),
   73:               escalus_client:send(Alice, IqGet),
   74:               Result = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   75:               escalus:assert(is_iq_result, [IqGet], Result),
   76:               escalus:assert(has_feature, [<<"urn:xmpp:carbons:2">>], Result)
   77:       end).
   78: 
   79: enabling_carbons(Config) ->
   80:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun carbons_get_enabled/1).
   81: 
   82: disabling_carbons(Config) ->
   83:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}],
   84:                   fun(Alice) -> carbons_get_enabled(Alice),
   85:                                 carbons_get_disabled(Alice) end).
   86: 
   87: avoiding_carbons(Config) ->
   88:     escalus:story(
   89:       Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}],
   90:       fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
   91:               carbons_get_enabled([Alice1,Alice2]),
   92:               Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_without_carbon_to(Bob,
   93:                                                           <<"And pious action">>),
   94:               escalus_client:send(Alice1, Msg),
   95:               escalus:assert(
   96:                 is_chat_message, [<<"And pious action">>],
   97:                 escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
   98:               escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
   99:               [] = escalus_client:peek_stanzas(Alice2)
  100:       end).
  101: 
  102: non_enabled_clients_dont_get_sent_carbons(Config) ->
  103:     escalus:story(
  104:       Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}],
  105:       fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
  106:               Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"And pious action">>),
  107:               escalus_client:send(Alice1, Msg),
  108:               escalus:assert(
  109:                 is_chat_message, [<<"And pious action">>],
  110:                 escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  111:               escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
  112:               [] = escalus_client:peek_stanzas(Alice2)
  113:       end).
  114: 
  115: non_enabled_clients_dont_get_received_carbons(Config) ->
  116:     escalus:story(
  117:       Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}],
  118:       fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
  119:               Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice1, <<"And pious action">>),
  120:               escalus_client:send(Bob, Msg),
  121:               escalus:assert(
  122:                 is_chat_message, [<<"And pious action">>],
  123:                 escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice1)),
  124:               escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
  125:               [] = escalus_client:peek_stanzas(Alice2)
  126:       end).
  127: 
  128: 
  129: enabled_single_resource_doesnt_get_carbons(Config) ->
  130:     BobsMessages = [
  131:                     <<"There's such a thing as dwelling">>,
  132:                     <<"On the thought ourselves have nursed,">>,
  133:                     <<"And with scorn and courage telling">>,
  134:                     <<"The world to do its worst.">>
  135:                    ],
  136:     escalus:story(
  137:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  138:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  139:               carbons_get_enabled(Alice),
  140:               [ escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, M))
  141:                 || M <- BobsMessages ],
  142:               [ escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [M], escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  143:                 || M <- BobsMessages ]
  144:       end).
  145: 
  146: dropped_client_doesnt_create_duplicate_carbons(Config) ->
  147:     AliceSpec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice),
  148:     escalus:story(
  149:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  150:       fun(Alice1, Bob) ->
  151:               Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"And pious action">>),
  152:               given_client_logs_in_gets_dropped(Config, AliceSpec),
  153: 
  154:               escalus_client:send(Alice1, Msg),
  155:               escalus:assert(
  156:                 is_chat_message, [<<"And pious action">>],
  157:                 escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  158:               [] = escalus_client:peek_stanzas(Alice1)
  159:       end).
  160: 
  161: %%
  162: %% Property generators
  163: %% TODO: Consider moving to separate lib (escalus_prop?)
  164: %%
  165: 
  166: p_forward_received_chat_messages(Config) ->
  167:     ?FORALL({N,Msg}, {no_of_resources(), utterance()},
  168:             true_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, N}],
  169:                        fun(Users) ->
  170:                                all_bobs_other_resources_get_received_carbons(Users,Msg)
  171:                        end)).
  172: 
  173: p_forward_sent_chat_messages(Config) ->
  174:     ?FORALL({N,Msg}, {no_of_resources(),utterance()},
  175:             true_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, N}],
  176:                        fun(Users) ->
  177:                                all_bobs_other_resources_get_sent_carbons(Users,Msg)
  178:                        end)).
  179: 
  180: p_normal_routing_to_bare_jid(Config) ->
  181:     ?FORALL({N,Msg}, {no_of_resources(),utterance()},
  182:             true_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, N}],
  183:                        fun(Users) ->
  184:                                all_bobs_resources_get_message_to_bare_jid(Users,Msg)
  185:                        end)).
  186: 
  187: 
  188: %%
  189: %% Test scenarios w/assertions
  190: %%
  191: 
  192: all_bobs_resources_get_message_to_bare_jid([Alice,Bob1|Bobs], Msg) ->
  193:     %% All connected resources receive messages sent
  194:     %% to the user's bare JID without carbon wrappers.
  195: 
  196:     carbons_get_enabled([Bob1|Bobs]),
  197:     escalus_client:send(
  198:       Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob1), Msg)),
  199:     GotMsg = fun(BobsResource) ->
  200:                      escalus:assert(
  201:                        is_chat_message,
  202:                        [Msg],
  203:                        escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(BobsResource)),
  204:                      escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(BobsResource)
  205:              end,
  206:     lists:foreach(GotMsg, [Bob1|Bobs]).
  207: 
  208: all_bobs_other_resources_get_received_carbons([Alice,Bob1|Bobs], Msg) ->
  209:     carbons_get_enabled([Bob1|Bobs]),
  210:     escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob1, Msg)),
  211:     GotForward = fun(BobsResource) ->
  212:                          escalus:assert(
  213:                            is_forwarded_received_message,
  214:                            [escalus_client:full_jid(Alice),
  215:                             escalus_client:full_jid(Bob1),
  216:                             Msg],
  217:                            escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(BobsResource)),
  218:                          escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(BobsResource) end,
  219:     lists:foreach(GotForward, Bobs).
  220: 
  221: all_bobs_other_resources_get_sent_carbons([Alice,Bob1|Bobs], Msg) ->
  222:     carbons_get_enabled([Bob1|Bobs]),
  223:     escalus_client:send(Bob1, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, Msg)),
  224:     escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  225:     GotCarbon = fun(BobsResource) ->
  226:                         escalus:assert(
  227:                           is_forwarded_sent_message,
  228:                           [escalus_client:full_jid(Bob1),
  229:                            escalus_client:full_jid(Alice),
  230:                            Msg],
  231:                           escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(BobsResource)),
  232:                         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(BobsResource) end,
  233:     lists:foreach(GotCarbon, Bobs).
  234: 
  235: carbons_get_disabled(ClientOrClients) ->
  236:     disable_carbons(ClientOrClients).
  237: 
  238: carbons_get_enabled(ClientOrClients) ->
  239:     enable_carbons(ClientOrClients).
  240: 
  241: 
  242: %%
  243: %% Internal helpers
  244: %%
  245: 
  246: given_client_logs_in_gets_dropped(Config, Spec) ->
  247:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, Spec, <<"connect-and-drop-client">>),
  248:     escalus_client:stop(Client),
  249:     timer:sleep(300).
  250: 
  251: %% Wrapper around escalus:story. Returns PropEr result.
  252: true_story(Config, UserSpecs, TestFun) ->
  253:     try   escalus:story(Config, UserSpecs, TestFun), true
  254:     catch E ->
  255:               ct:pal("~p", [E]),
  256:               {error, E}
  257:     end.
  258: 
  259: %% Number of resources per users
  260: no_of_resources() -> random:uniform(4).
  261: 
  262: %% A sample chat message
  263: utterance() ->
  264:     proper_types:oneof(
  265:       [<<"Now, fair Hippolyta, our nuptial hour">>,
  266:        <<"Draws on apace; four happy days bring in">>,
  267:        <<"Another moon: but, O, methinks, how slow">>,
  268:        <<"This old moon wanes! she lingers my desires">>,
  269:        <<"Like to a step-dame or a dowager">>,
  270:        <<"Long withering out a young man revenue.">>]).
  271: 
  272: 
  273: enable_carbons(Clients) when is_list(Clients) ->
  274:     lists:foreach(fun enable_carbons/1, Clients);
  275: enable_carbons(Client) ->
  276:     IqSet = escalus_stanza:carbons_enable(),
  277:     escalus_client:send(Client, IqSet),
  278:     Result = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  279:     escalus:assert(is_iq, [<<"result">>], Result).
  280: 
  281: 
  282: disable_carbons(Clients) when is_list(Clients) ->
  283:     lists:foreach(fun disable_carbons/1, Clients);
  284: disable_carbons(Client) ->
  285:     IqSet = escalus_stanza:carbons_disable(),
  286:     escalus_client:send(Client, IqSet),
  287:     Result = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  288:     escalus:assert(is_iq, [<<"result">>], Result).
